pkgmetadata.longdescription: # QHBM LibraryThis repository is a collection of tools for building and trainingQuantum Hamiltonian-Based Models. These tools depend on[TensorFlow Quantum](https://www.tensorflow.org/quantum),and are thus compatible with both real and simulated quantum computers.[Installation instructions](https://github.com/google/qhbm-library/blob/main/docs/INSTALL.md) and [contribution instructions](https://github.com/google/qhbm-library/blob/main/docs/contributing.md) can be found in the docs folder.This is not an officially supported Google product.
